description:
Unleash the power of Periscope today!

Learn how you can use the power of Periscope for your business, to expand your brand and get your message in front of TONS of live viewers that hail from all over the world, while driving traffic to your own website, services and products.

Get face to face connections with your loyal followers who are anxiously awaiting your next broadcast!

In this course you will learn the following:

  • How to Master Periscope Live Video Broadcasts Like a Professional
  • Navigate the Periscope App with Ease
  • How you can use Periscope for building up your brand and driving more traffic to what matters
  • How To Build A Large Following on Periscope of Targeted Users
  • How You Can Build a Devoted Group of Followers Who Are Waiting for Your Next Broadcast
  • Learn exactly HOW and WHEN you should Ask for Hearts, Follows & Shares
  • Learning How to Engage and Interact with Your Viewers
  • Tips to Overcome the Fears of Live Broadcasting
  • Learning Clever Strategies to Leverage the Power of Periscope in Your Own Business


I've been researching to learn the ins and outs of Periscope ever since I first discovered the scorching new social media platform. Being a fanatic of videos and running my own video production company, Periscope excited me greatly. I have watched and studied some of the best in order to compile one of the best courses you will find in the market. I will share with you how you too can leverage the power of this platform in your own business.

This course will teach you EVERYTHING you ABSOLUTELY need to know for using Periscope like a professional.

Are you ready to get started?

I look forward to connecting with you as you work through this course. Sign up today!

To your success,
Marcus Hayne
title: Periscope For Business
